character.noteList: Elf Features: • Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light • Immune to magical sleep, advantage on saves vs charmed • Meditating 4 hours counts as 8 hours of rest • Perception proficiency • Can hide while lightly obscured by natural phenomena • Longsword, shortsword, shortbow, longbow proficiency Noble Feature: • You can secure an audience with a local noble Class Features: • Understand a secret druid language • You can shapeshift into the form of a beast as an action (see rules) • Druid Archetype: Land • You know an extra druid cantrip • Regain half your level worth of spell slots during a short rest (once per day) • Forest - Gain bonus known spells • You are unaffected by nonmagical difficult terrain or plants and gain advantage vs magical plants that effect movement • War Caster: You gain advantage on concentration vs damage, can still cast while holding weapons, and can cast a single target 1 action spell as an opportunity attack • You are immune to poison and disease, and to effects by elementals or fey that frighten or charm ⊠Light Armor, Medium Armor, Shields ⊠Longswords, Shortswords, Shortbows, Longbows Clubs, Daggers, Darts, Javelins, Maces, Quarterstaffs, Scimitars, Sickles, Slings, Spears ⊠Herbalism Kit One type of gaming set ⊠Common, Elvish Druidic One Extra Language ⊠wooden shield OR simple weapon scimitar OR simple melee weapon leather armor explorer's pack druidic focus set of fine clothes signet ring scroll of pedigree purse ⊠⊠Druid 11⊠Wood Elf⊠Noble⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠⊠Baroness Azani⊠Druid 11⊠0⊠0⊠0⊠25⊠0⊠0
